title: The Social Network for Cats
description: A platform for cat owners to connect, share photos, and organize playdates for their feline friends. It aimed to be the 'Facebook for Cats'.

attempts.description: Launched a basic iOS and Android app with core social features.
attempts.outcome: Minimal user engagement; high churn rate after initial download.

lessons_learned: Market validation is crucial before significant development. Cat owners preferred existing platforms or offline interactions for pet-related content. Niche too small and value proposition unclear.
